vote.title: Reappointment of Joseph A. Lombardi, Director, Department of Finance and Management, City of Columbus, 90 West Broad Street, Columbus, OH 43215, to serve on the Solid Waste Authority of Central Ohio Board of Trustees, with a new term expiration date of June 20, 2023 (resume attached).

Reappointment of Joseph A. Lombardi, Director, Department of Finance and Management, City of Columbus, 90 West Broad Street, Columbus, OH 43215, to serve on the Solid Waste Authority of Central Ohio Board of Trustees, with a new term expiration date of June 20, 2023 (resume attached).
